summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's innovative Fermented Camellia Creamy Cleansing Oil is formulated with fermented camellia oil, camellia extract and a nourishing blend of linoleic-rich oils that helps dissolve makeup, oil, sunscreen and other impurities. Developed for all skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsUnique oil-in-gel texture that transforms on skinBreaks down makeup, oil & other impuritiesCleanses while leaving skin feeling soft & nourishedDermatologist testedFragrance freeVegan, paraben & cruelty freeFeaturesNaturium's first cleansing oil that utilizes d-phase emulsification to combine humectants and oil in a unique cleansing formatKey IngredientsFermented Camellia Oil: powerful antioxidant, rich & luxurious emollient, leaves skin feeling soft & suppleCamellia Extract: soothes & calms skin, works to visibly reduce appearance of redness, helps defend against environmental stressorsLinoleic-Rich Oils: nourish & soften skin, provide lightweight hydration, help support a healthy skin barrierItem 2627347How To UseUsing dry hands, work a generous amount into palms and warm for 8-10 seconds until cleanser transforms into oil phase. Massage onto dry skin to dissolve impurities and add water to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly and follow with second cleanse. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Aqua, Sucrose Laurate, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Argania Spinosa Kernel Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Melia Azadirachta Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Using dry hands, work a generous amount into palms and warm for 8-10 seconds until cleanser transforms into oil phase. Massage onto dry skin to dissolve impurities and add water to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly and follow with second cleanse. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.
ingredients: Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate

reviews.headline: Perfect makeup remover!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this jelly? The texture is so cool! How could anyone dislike this product! I apply a genourous ammount and wait for it to warm up as I massage my face. My favorite part of my night time routine! üíïüßñ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Not worth trying
reviews.comments: I like the brand, but this product was a fail for me.  It does not do a good job removing eye makeup, then leaves a residue that doesn't rinse clean.  It left my eyes blurry.

reviews.headline: BUY IT
reviews.comments: This cleaning oil is amazing it literally removes everything leaving my skin feeling hydrated not even oily but hydrated! It feels & smells amazing!

reviews.headline: Fabulous for older skin!
reviews.comments: I am 52 years old and absolutely love this cleansing oil. It takes off Loreal Panorama mascara when nothing else would. With it being oil based it moisturizes my skin rather than drying it out. I use many of the Naturium products now and my skin is finally glowing and at my age! Love it!

reviews.headline: love love love!!!
reviews.comments: i absolutely adore this oil cleanser!! it takes all my makeup off, doesn't hurt if it gets in my eyes, and works wonderfully with the naturium cleanser afterwards. also, something about the gel-to-oil consistency is so satisfying to feel change in my hands before applying to my face lol

reviews.headline: Really wanted to like it
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this especially since ive tried quite a naturium products, specifically their body washes. I love their body washes and kept this in mind when i bought it, I was expecting this cleanser to be just as good but boy was i wrong. i dont use any waterproof makeup products and a majority of the time i dont wear makeup but i still double cleanse regradless of whether or not i wore makeup that day. This barely took off makeup, so much would be left behind that id either have to triple wash my face or just use micellar water to get the rest off. My face never felt clean afterwards either and honesly, it felt like i had even more gunk and oils on my face than what i started with. i really wanted to like this and i continued to use it after deciding that i didnt like the product. im not sure if your skin is suppose to feel hydrated after using this or what and if thats the case, this might work if your skin is on the drier side but thats a big if.

reviews.headline: Not sure if this is suitable for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: It works, but not on waterproof make up and mascara. I don't see anything that its ideal for sensitive slin because my face always looked red when i washed it off.

reviews.headline: Great and affordable!
reviews.comments: This has to be one of my favorite oil cleansers for double cleansing. It truly does melt away your makeup and sunscreen. It also makes your face feel super soft after. Plus, its super afforable compared to other brands.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: Absolutely loveeee this cleanser. Ive tried many others that would irritate my eyes and leave a weird film over my eyes after use. This one doesnt do that at all and does a great job at removing my makeup. The gel to oil transformation is also really cool, definitely recommend!!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Easy to use and melts away all the makeup and dirt!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Easy to use and melts away all the makeup and dirt!

reviews.headline: I use it everyday
reviews.comments: I throughly enjoy this makeup remover. It is thick but if you work it in on dry skin and then add water to emulsify it, then it works like a charm. It's about using just enough and not too much because it will spread as you rub it in. It removes waterproof mascara, eyeliner and all. The plus is that it isn't drying.

reviews.headline: Absolutely my favorite
reviews.comments: I love rhis formula! Its in a tube and comes out as a gel so i have full control of how much product i get. The directions did say to warm in hands dor 8-10 seconds and it woll become an oil and took off my waterproof mascara great. It did take some work but it did an amazinf job.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Consistency of honey and doesn't emulsify much. Leaves mascara behind.

reviews.headline: Creamy oily gel like texture
reviews.comments: I like the packaging.  Texture is nice but a little too thick.  Better to wipe off excess instead of washing off.  You still need eye makeup remover.  Would recommend over other products but not my Clinique makeup removing balm. My facial skin needs less friction.

reviews.headline: Pass
reviews.comments: I love most of the products of this brand, but this is definitely my least favorite. I find you have to work too hard to get the product to turn into an oil and it doesnt do that well at removing makeup compared to other cleansing oils. My face and eyes also stung for a bit after using. Defnite Pass.

reviews.headline: Best makeup remover out there
reviews.comments: Favorite cleansing balm/oil! I love that I don't have to funk my hands into a tub of product. I will say the texture is a pure preference thing

reviews.headline: Do not buy, HARD SKIP
reviews.comments: There are so much better cleansing oils and melting balms in the market, whether it is more affordable brands or luxury brands. This texture did not feel like an oil, it feels more like a gel. It was really hard to melt/activate with hands which made it abrasive trying to remove makeup and it didn't even take off all the makeup. Very disappointing

reviews.headline: Mediocre product
reviews.comments: for the price of this product i would say its not worth it. many oil cleansers ive tried remove makeup just as well and emulsify much better than this product. the gel takes a lot of work to melt it down to an oil in your hands which just makes the whole process that much more effortful and time consuming

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this cleanser! It is not as messy as jar balms and better for travel I think. It's amazing at dissolving and my skin - 53 y o and very dry - loves this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this!

faceoff_negative.comments: I never write reviews. Ever. I had really high hopes for this product, but every time I use it theres an oily film leftover after I rinse. I know my skincare and I wanted to test out other cleansing oils/balms. I'm Korean and I've been double cleansing since the beginning of time. I even tried to double cleanse with a silicone face brush after to help break up the oil, but after my second cleanse I have remnants of eyeliner around my eyes that I can't even wipe away. Sad this didn't work out and now I have a whole bottle of product I can't even use on other parts of my body. Just a big waste.
faceoff_negative.headline: Had high hopes
